Title: Iwaki Meisei Daigaku
Description: ['Commercials and promotional videos commissioned by Iwaki Meisei University from Production I.G.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Hashiru Shiki-hen, ' ', ' A girl runs through various seasons on campus.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Digest-hen, ' ', ' A girl reminisces about activities on campus such as her friendships, studying, and joining a small percussion band.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Ohai Alii: Kagayaku Hi no Tame ni, ' ', ' For the new nursing school it shows what student life will be like at the nursing school by following a fictional freshman who joins the hula club.
